summary:
Pepper: Tony, I don't think you need anymore coffee.
Tony: Coffee cures depression. 
Pepper: I don't think it works tha-
Tony:...
body:
Pepper: Tony, I don’t think you need anymore coffee.

Tony: Coffee cures depression.

Pepper: I don’t think it works tha-

Tony: More espresso, less depresso.

Pepper: Tony, please.

reblog.comment:
Pepper: Tony, I don’t think you need anymore coffee.

Tony: Coffee cures depression.

Pepper: I don’t think it works tha-

Tony: More espresso, less depresso.

Pepper: Tony, please.

trail.content_raw:
Pepper: Tony, I don’t think you need anymore coffee.

Tony: Coffee cures depression.

Pepper: I don’t think it works tha-

Tony: More espresso, less depresso.

Pepper: Tony, please.
trail.content:
Pepper: Tony, I don’t think you need anymore coffee.

Tony: Coffee cures depression.

Pepper: I don’t think it works tha-

Tony: More espresso, less depresso.

Pepper: Tony, please.

tags: james is named after Rhodey btw
summary: I made Tony, Peter and Pepper in Sims and Pepper got pregnant and gave birth to twin boys (which I called James and Morgan) who...
body:
I made Tony, Peter and Pepper in Sims and Pepper got pregnant and gave birth to twin boys (which I called James and Morgan) who are basically tiny Tony’s and it’s adorable.

There they are! 

Look at Tony happily looking at his big kid talk to one of his little kids.

Peter and James playing some sort of pretend game with Tony.

Just Peter being adorable with the kids.

Look at him! So happy!
body_abstract: I made Tony, Peter and Pepper in Sims and Pepper got pregnant and gave birth to twin boys (which I called James and Morgan) who are basically tiny Tony’s and it’s adorable.

summary: MCU Fandom, I need help finding a post!
body:
MCU Fandom, I need help finding a post!

I’m trying to find the post that talks about the modifications Tony makes to his suits each time something happens to him! Like when he couldn’t reach Rhodey in time so he adds the thruster in IW.

blog.title: I Do Quotes
blog.description:
They're incorrect of course.

Send some into the inbox! THIS IS A STUCKY SAFE BLOG YALL.

summary:
Tony, with Peter: It's way too damn dark out here, we need a light.
Peter: Don't worry Mr. Stark-
Tony: Kid I swear to god if...
body:
Tony, with Peter: It’s way too damn dark out here, we need a light.

Peter: Don’t worry Mr. Stark-

Tony: Kid I swear to god if you stomp your foot and your shoe lights up I’m taking the suit back.

Peter, setting his foot down lightly: Okay.

reblog.comment:
Tony, with Peter: It’s way too damn dark out here, we need a light.

Peter: Don’t worry Mr. Stark-

Tony: Kid I swear to god if you stomp your foot and your shoe lights up I’m taking the suit back.

Peter, setting his foot down lightly: Okay.

Peter: Don’t worry Mr. Stark-

summary: I was reading some MCU fics where Tony is the youngest and they all find out, I didn't like them because they were not...
question: I was reading some MCU fics where Tony is the youngest and they all find out, I didn't like them because they were not realistic, but they I found out how young tony was in AA and then I loved them
answer:
ASDFGHJKL

I mean, Tony isn’t the youngest, that honor goes to Sam, but I am infintely amused by the idea of the team not realizing Tony is the youngest of the adults. Like, they’re all within they’re early to mid twenties but Tony is technically the youngest so he gets treated like a kid.

reblog.comment:

trail.content_raw:
ASDFGHJKL

I mean, Tony isn’t the youngest, that honor goes to Sam, but I am infintely amused by the idea of the team not realizing Tony is the youngest of the adults. Like, they’re all within they’re early to mid twenties but Tony is technically the youngest so he gets treated like a kid.

title: But He Didn’t Answer
